channel.title: Contravariance. A Swift Podcast
channel.description: A podcast about Apple, Swift and other programming topics. By Benedikt Terhechte and Bas Broek.
channel.itunes:author: Bas Broek / Benedikt Terhechte
channel.itunes:summary: A podcast about Apple, Swift and other programming topics. By Benedikt Terhechte and Bas Broek.
channel.itunes:keywords: apple, swift, mac, iphone, ipad, macos, mojave, rust

item.title: 105: Paul "John Sundell" Hudson
item.itunes:author: Bas Broek / Benedikt Terhechte / Paul Hudson
item.description: An interview with Paul Hudson about his career, talking about journalism, books, Venn diagrams, conference speaking and diversity.
item.itunes:summary: An interview with Paul Hudson about his career, talking about journalism, books, Venn diagrams, conference speaking and diversity.

item.title: 104: Conferences
item.itunes:author: Bas Broek / Benedikt Terhechte
item.description: A general discussion around iOS conferences: Why you should go there, what you should do there, and what to do if you want to give a talk. Also a short report on two conferences we just attended: NSSpain and Try Swift.
item.itunes:summary: A general discussion around iOS conferences: Why you should go there, what you should do there, and what to do if you want to give a talk. Also a short report on two conferences we just attended: NSSpain and Try Swift.

item.title: 103: A Philosophical Treatise on the Definition of Pro
item.itunes:author: Bas Broek / Benedikt Terhechte
item.description: Bas and Benedikt discuss what a "Pro" device represents at Apple, what a Mac Mini Pro could be, and why the Touchbar should not be in a Pro device.
item.itunes:summary: Bas and Benedikt discuss what a "Pro" device represents at Apple, what a Mac Mini Pro could be, and why the Touchbar should not be in a Pro device.
